name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Countdown timer For PC,Windows and Mac (Update)

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Simple countdown timer extension For PC

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Countdown for PC, Windows, and Mac Set precise timers effortlessly. Enjoy a simple, easy-to-use extension that ensures your tasks are on schedule. Start timing with minutes and seconds, and let this handy tool handle the rest seamlessly.


✅ Countdown Extension Features

✔️Countdown Timer: Here time can be set. After clicking on Start Timer with minutes and seconds in the timer, it will turn off at exactly that time.

✔️Easy To use

✔️Simple Extension



✅ How To Use Countdown on PC?

Step 1: Start by adding this extension to your Chrome browser by clicking "Add to Chrome."

Step 2: Next, click on the Extension icon.

Step 3: You can set the time here. Upon clicking "Start Timer" with the specified minutes and seconds, the timer will turn off precisely at that time.

Step 4: Enjoy a safer browsing experience!



✅ Disclaimer:

Please note that "Countdown for PC, Windows, and Mac" Chrome Extension is an independent product and is not associated, affiliated, or endorsed by the Countdown Android app or its developers. We respect intellectual property rights and make no claim to any copyrights associated with the Countdown Android app.
